column13: In March 2023, Liontown commenced constructing a Tailings Storage Facility (TSF). The TSF will be an above-ground downstream constructed paddock-style facility (built using mine waste) with two cells (A and B), proposed for an eventual total capacity of 14.72 million tonnes of tailings. Tailings discharge is proposed at an annual rate ranging from 0.86 to 1.4Mtpa. The facility, including the basin area, will have a footprint of approximately 102.7 hectares.
